name: Algora
title: algora.io
shortDescription: Algora is an innovative open source tech recruiting platform that leverages detailed GitHub OSS contribution data to streamline the hiring process. It's designed for companies looking to hire skilled engineers quickly and cost-effectively. Users can highlight applicant contributions, automatically screen and rank candidates, and even conduct paid trial projects to assess fit. Algora is ideal for tech startups and companies needing flexible, skilled engineering talent.
pros: Uses GitHub data for precise matching
Offers paid trials to assess candidate fit
cons: Limited to developers active on GitHub
Dependent on the quality of GitHub data
